name: 0palsec
tweet: An 0-day #vulnerability in #Microsoft #Exchange is being actively exploited to drop web shells on compromised servers and move laterally within the network.  For more information on what to look for and temporary mitigations:  https://t.co/0HXkdcAOI4

name: Huntress
tweet: Threat advisory: Our team is currently investigating a new 0-day vulnerability in Microsoft Exchange servers. The tl;dr recommendation is to patch if you haven’t already following ProxyShell/Logon.  We’ll continue to update our blog.  https://t.co/KE8hg6XhjP  https://t.co/nUOQ3n3BYM

name: Manoranjan News
tweet: Microsoft Detects, Patches 0-Day Exploit Used to Goal Ecu, Central American Customers  https://t.co/qzGnCrUBBi
